name: cncf-interactive-landscape
description: Interactive visualization of cloud native projects and products

scripts.open:src: export PROJECT_PATH="$PWD";cd node_modules/interactive-landscape; npm run yaml2json && babel-node tools/srcServer.js
scripts.yaml2json: export PROJECT_PATH="$PWD"; cd node_modules/interactive-landscape; babel-node tools/generateJson.js
scripts.build: export PROJECT_PATH="$PWD"; npm explore interactive-landscape -- npm run build

author: CNCF
